content:
Presenting the gift basket in a thoughtful way can make it even more special and meaningful to your coworker.

Here are some ideas to consider:

1. **Add a personal touch**: Include a card with a heartfelt, handwritten message. You could express your congratulations, wish them well, and mention how excited you are to meet the baby. A simple message like "Wishing you all the best as you embark on this new chapter" or "Congratulations on the new addition to your family!" can go a long way.
2. **Keep it professional (but still warm)**: If you want to maintain a professional tone, you could opt for a more formal message like "Congratulations on the arrival of your baby! Wishing you all the best." or "Best wishes to you and your growing family."
3. **Add a decorative touch**: Consider adding some decorative elements to the gift basket, like a ribbon or a small bouquet of flowers. This can make the presentation feel more special and celebratory.
4. **Include a gift tag**: If you prefer a more subtle approach, you could attach a gift tag to the basket with a simple message like "Congratulations!" or "Welcome to the world, baby!"

Remember, the most important thing is to come from a place of kindness and thoughtfulness. Your coworker will appreciate the effort you put into selecting the gift and presenting it in a caring way.

When you give the gift, you could say something like, "I wanted to bring by a small gift to celebrate the new addition to your family. I hope you find these items useful and enjoy this special time with your baby."
